properties.description: Generic person types defined by CWRC.

options.currentHumanPlace: Current populated place or administrative boundary place name
options.historicalHumanPlace: Historical populated place or administrative boundary place name
options.currentNaturalPlace: Current natural geographic feature place name
options.historicalNaturalPlace: Historical natural geographic feature place name

properties.title: Place Type

properties.description: Select one or more projects to associate the present entity record.
properties.title: Project

properties.description: Provide the place's standard name.
properties.title: Preferred name

properties.description: Provide the place's alternative name.
properties.title: Variant name

properties.description: Specify a project that uses this as the preferred form of the name.
properties.title: Name Preferred By

properties.description: By selecting a certainty level you can specify an approximate degree of confidence on a given piece of information about this entity.
properties.title: Certainty

properties.description: Enter a URI to a linked data resource that is the same as this entity (e.g., a VIAF record).
properties.title: Same As

properties.description: By selecting a certainty level you can specify an approximate degree of confidence on a given piece of information about this entity.
properties.title: Certainty

properties.description: Select a date of existence from the date picker.
properties.title: Date

properties.description: Captures a date type in relation to its association with the entity described.
properties.title: Date Type

properties.description: Factuality captures whether or not the entity (person, organization, or place) is real, fictional, or both (i.e., a mixture of both real and fictional).
properties.title: Factuality

properties.description: Latitude in decimal degrees of the place entity. Example: for the place entity Edmonton, the latitude in decimal degrees is "53.55014".
properties.title: Latitude

properties.description: Longitude in decimal degrees of the place entity. Example: for the place entity Edmonton, the longitude in decimal degrees is "-113.46871".
properties.title: Longitude

properties.description: The GeoNames feature class of the place entity. Example: for the place entity Edmonton, the GeoNames feature class is "Populated Place Feature".
properties.title: Feature Class

properties.description: The GeoNames feature code label of the place entity (see http://www.geonames.org/export/codes.html). Example: for the place entity Edmonton, the GeoNames feature code label is "seat of a first-order administrative division".
properties.title: Feature Code Label

properties.description: The ISO 3166-1 English country name that contains the place entity (see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1). Example: for the place entity Edmonton, the English country name is "Canada".
properties.title: Country Name

properties.description: The ISO 3166-2 country subdivision name, or first-level (first-order) administrative division name (e.g., province or state) that contains the place entity (see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2). Example: for the place entity Edmonton, the first-level administrative division name is "Alberta".
properties.title: First Administrative Division

properties.description: The second-level (second-order) administrative division name (e.g., county) that contains the place entity (see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Table_of_administrative_divisions_by_country). Example: for the place entity Arva, Ontario, the second-level administrative division name is "Middlesex County".
properties.title: Second Administrative Division

properties.description: Elevation in meters of the place entity. Example: for the place entity Mount Logan (in Yukon), the elevation in meters is "5,959".
properties.title: Elevation

properties.description: Using a digital elevation model (srtm3 or gtopo30), average elevation of a 3''x3'' (ca 90mx90m) or 30''x30'' (ca 900mx900m) area in meters. Example: for the place entity Edmonton, the average elevation in meters is "610".
properties.title: Average Elevation

properties.description: The time zone UTC standard time offset that contains the place entity. Example: for the place entity Edmonton, the time zone UTM standard time offset is "-7.0".
properties.title: Time Zone Offset

properties.description: Enter a descriptive note about the present entity.
properties.title: Note
